resources.string: Kindergarten Readiness app helps parent to find out whether their child is ready for KINDERGARTEN.

Your child is old enough to start kindergarten â€” but is he or she ready? \nKindergarten Readiness app helps parent to find out whether their little ones are ready to start formal education - KINDERGARTEN. \nIt also helps the parents by providing additional information, knowledge, resources required to make their child ready for Kindergarten.
Parents can assess their child by answering few questions. Once the answers are submitted this app will evaluate your child and provide feedback.
Parents can select a topic to assess their child by answering few questions. Once the answers are submitted this app will evaluate your child and provide feedback.
How much do you know about your child skills ?
Is your child ready for KINDERGARTEN ?
Select a topic to start quiz
Wonderful, your child is ready for Kindergarten !!!
Your toddler need MORE TIME to start Kindergarten. We can help to develop the required skills.
